An enchanted crystal created by Mages of the\nGreen Moon. Restores 500 HP for one ally.
An enchanted crystal created by Mages of the\nGreen Moon. Restores 1,000 HP for one ally.
An enchanted crystal created by Mages of the\nGreen Moon. Restores 1,000 HP for all allies.
An enchanted crystal created by Mages of the\nGreen Moon. Restores all HP for one ally.
Created from the dew that forms on a magical\ntree. Restores 1 MP for one ally.
A more concentrated form of the Magic Droplet.\nRestores 10 MP for one ally.
A sacred stone that boosts the Spirit of the\nentire party to heroic levels.
A valuable treasure sought by Zivilyn Bane on\nDaccat's Island.
A valuable treasure sought by Zivilyn Bane in\nthe Grand Fortress.
An ensorcelled crystal that cures all adverse\neffects on one ally, except for Unconscious.
An ensorcelled crystal that has a 50% chance of\nreviving one ally, with 50% of their maximum HP.
An ensorcelled crystal that will revive an ally\nto Max HP.
Developed by De Loco's Researchers.\nIncreases the Power of one ally.
Developed by De Loco's Researchers.\nIncreases the Quick of the entire party.
Developed by De Loco's Researchers.\nAllows one ally to regenerate health.
A valuable treasure sought by Zivilyn Bane in\nthe Dark Rift.
A valuable treasure sought by Zivilyn Bane in\nMount Kazai.
A valuable treasure sought by Zivilyn Bane in\nGlacia.
An edible fruit fertilized by Moon Stones.\nEating it will enable you to learn a technique.
Cupil gets excited when Chams are in the area.\nFeeding them to Cupil will enable him to evolve.
The seed of a Paranta Tree, which blooms under\na full Red Moon. Increases Power by 3.
The seed of an Icyl Tree, which blooms under a\nfull Purple Moon. Increases Will by 3.
The seed of a Zaal Tree, which blooms under a\nfull Yellow Moon. Increases Vigor by 3.
The seed of a Dexus Tree, which blooms under\nthe light of 6 full Moons. Increases Agile by 1.
The seed of a Sylph Tree, which blooms under a\nfull Blue Moon. Increases Quick by 3.
The seed of a Vidal Tree, which blooms under a\nfull Green Moon. Increases Max HP by 30.
The seed of a Magus Tree, which blooms under a\nfull Silver Moon. Increases Max MP by 1.

A mage of the Red Moon has enchanted a box with\nthe spell, Pyrum. 5 or 6 charges.

A valuable treasure sought by Zivilyn Bane in\nPyrynn.
A valuable treasure sought by Zivilyn Bane in\nRixis.
A common fish at the bottom of the food chain.\nThey are fare for most Mid Ocean residents.
A type of fish that doesn't taste very good,\nbut is valued for its fiery red scales.
Most commonly found near Mid Ocean. Has thick,\nbarbed scales.
Spiked Sunfish travel in schools, in order to\navoid predators. They can be eaten or sold.
If Cupil eats an Abirik Cham, he will evolve\ninto his next form.
A contaminated form of Cham that causes Cupil\nto regurgitate all Chams.
Pollen from the Kanezl Plants found north of\nNasr. An expensive export of Nasrad.
Ilchymis' special mix of herbs, this amazing\npotion will fully restore the party's HP and MP.
A valuable treasure sought by Zivilyn Bane in\nSoltis.
A traditional Nasr dish featuring grilled Kabal\nmeat. Restores one ally's MP by 2.
A Kabal Skewer made with only the finest of\ningredients. Completely restores one ally's MP.
An extremely rare gourd, found in Ixa'taka,\nthat increases an ally's Max HP by 200.
A meal made from exotic ingredients that \nfully replenishes the party's HP and MP.
A meal made from rare ingredients that \nfully replenishes the party's HP and MP.
One of the three lost sacred figurines that\nPinta is looking for.
One of the three lost sacred figurines that\nPinta is looking for.
A fish, believed to be extinct since the Old\nWorld, recently discovered near the Dark Rift.
Found near Valua. An air fish that's known\nfor its great taste.
A larger ray, rarely caught. Valued for its\nhide, rather than consumption.
These small creatures are often found in windy\nareas. They are small, but edible.
Larger than a Spear Squid, and can make a\ndecent meal. Can be eaten raw.
A fish found near the Dark Rift. Despite its\ngrotesque appearance, it tastes pretty good.
A fish that uses a glowing tentacle as a lure\nto catch smaller fish. These fish are delicious.
Its body is a translucent white. It's found at\nhigh altitudes, and has a bland taste.
A rare fish found at high altitudes above Mid\nOcean. Very high in nutritional value.
Has fins that look like wings. Commonly eaten in\nthe East raw, or cooked in broth.
Found at high altitudes above Yafutoma. Prized\nas a delicacy, but not much of it is edible.
An eel found in dark areas, under clouds or\ncontinents. Barely edible.
A Nerath Eel that has lived for years.\nGood food for those who need an energy boost.
Very little is known about this rare creature.\nIts meat is a delicacy.
An extremely rare creature. The wealthy would \npay bags of gold just to look at it.
